rule: Focus on the specific structural features of the flowers when distinguishing between closely related plant species.
failure_pattern: The model incorrectly predicted 'Red_Ginger' instead of 'Prince_Of_Wales_Feathers' due to the similarity in the fluffy, feathery appearance of the flowers.

rule: Focus on the detailed structural features of the flower when making predictions, especially for plants with unique textures and shapes.
failure_pattern: The model incorrectly predicted 'Red_Ginger' instead of 'Prince_Of_Wales_Feathers' due to a misinterpretation of the fluffy, feathery texture and vibrant pink color.

rule: Focus on the unique petal and lip characteristics when identifying orchids.
